p: To date, we are unaware of any other in vitro study concerning these two transepithelial abutment surfaces on which these cellular parameters have been studied. Nevertheless, of note may be the article by Atay et al., in which cytotoxicity and cellular apoptosis on various ceramic and polymeric materials produced by a CAD/CAM system are studied. This group includes IPS e.max CAD and Vita CAD-Temp, where it is shown that the latter presents low cytotoxicity levels [ 7].
